__prompts__.project_name: project_name - Short name of your project and python package/module (max 4 words)
__prompts__.author_name: author_name - Author name(s) (and/or your organization/company/team). If many, separate by comma
__prompts__.author_email: author_email - E-Mail(s) of main author(s). If many, separate by comma
__prompts__.description: description - A short description of the project
__prompts__.app_version: app_version - Application version (expects X.Y.Z (Major.Minor.Patch), in accordance with https://semver.org/ )

open_source_license.__prompt__: Select one of the licenses, default is MIT. For more info: https://opensource.org/licenses

__prompts__.docker_baseimage: docker_baseimage - Docker image your Dockerfile starts from (FROM docker_baseimage). Don't provide the tag, yet
__prompts__.baseimage_tag: baseimage_tag - Default tag for docker_baseimage (for Tensorflow: CPU version, e.g. 2.9.1)
__prompts__.baseimage_gpu_tag: baseimage_gpu_tag - If docker_baseimage has a *separate* GPU version (like Tensorflow images, e.g. 2.9.1-gpu), please, provide here, otherwise leave empty
